page.title: 14FAMILY BUSINESS-ST.NINIANS.
page.content: This page is an example of some of the small business in the St.Ninians Block. Mr.J.B.Cook is the Managing Director of{Jim Cook ,Joiner Ltd.}and Mr.J.E.Scobie is the Managing Director of{Watermation,Scotland. In the joinery business Mr.Cook works with wood. His main offices are in Torbrex,Stirling. Mr.Cook uses special tools and dresses in hard wearing thick overalls . The tools he uses includes, saws hammers, chisels and nails. In Watermation Scotland Mr.Scobie does jobs like putting sprinklers in Golf Courses and Bowling Greens. He also sells pipes, wood, gravel etc. Mr.Scobie like Mr.Cook needs to use special tools but not a special uniform. His tools include diggers, spades, spades, pliers, spanners, screwdrivers etc.
